data.text:
How to Watch the Orioles vs. Blue Jays Game: Streaming & TV Channel Info for August 7

Published 7:05 am Wednesday, August 7, 2024

Gunnar Henderson and the Baltimore Orioles will meet George Springer and the Toronto Blue Jays on Wednesday at Rogers Centre, at 7:07 PM ET.

Watch MLB, other live sports and more on Fubo! Use our link to sign up for a free trial.

Orioles vs. Blue Jays Live Stream, TV Channel and Game Info

Date: Wednesday, August 7, 2024

Time: 7:07 PM ET

Location: Toronto, Ontario

Venue: Rogers Centre

TV Channel: MASN2

Live Stream: Watch this game on Fubo

Catch MLB action all season long on Fubo!.

Orioles Batting & Pitching Performance

The Baltimore Orioles have hit a league-leading 175 home runs, averaging 1.5 per game.

Baltimore leads MLB with a .452 slugging percentage this season, racking up 399 extra-base hits.

The Orioles have the sixth-best batting average in the league (.255).

Baltimore is the third-highest scoring team in baseball, averaging 5.1 runs per game (578 total).

The Orioles rank 10th in baseball with a .319 on-base percentage.

The Orioles strike out 8.2 times per game, the No. 12 average in baseball.

Baltimore has a 3.91 team ERA that ranks 12th among all MLB pitching staffs.

Baltimore’s pitching staff is 15th in MLB with a collective 8.6 strikeouts per nine innings.

The Orioles average MLB’s 11th-ranked WHIP (1.231).

Place your bets on any MLB matchup at BetMGM, and sign up with our link for a first-time deposit bonus!

Orioles Probable Starting Pitcher

Trevor Rogers (2-10 with a 4.76 ERA and 88 strikeouts in 109 2/3 innings pitched) makes the start for the Orioles, his 23rd of the season.

In his last time out on Thursday against the Cleveland Guardians, the left-hander threw 4 1/3 innings, giving up five earned runs while surrendering six hits.

Rogers is looking to collect his fourth quality start of the season.

Rogers will try to pick up his 17th outing of five or more innings pitched this season. He averages five innings per appearance.

In one of his appearances this season he did not allow an earned run.
